SELECT dm.meal_id, dm.user_id, f.idx, dm.date, dm.meal_time, f.food_name, f.major_category_name, f.nutrient_reference_amount, f.energy_kcal, f.protein_g, f.fat_g, f.carbohydrate_g, dm.created_at, dm.updated_at FROM daily_meals dm JOIN foods f ON dm.idx = f.idx WHERE dm.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY FIELD(meal_time, '아침', '점심', '저녁', '간식'), date;
